Localization.Name: Drake Interplanetary
Localization.Description: Makes affordable, modular ships that have become the go-to manufacturer for anyone looking to get their first ship, but have become associated with criminal elements.

English.Name: Drake Interplanetary
English.Description: Makes affordable, modular ships that have become the go-to manufacturer for anyone looking to get their first ship, but have become associated with criminal elements.

Localization.Name: Musashi Industrial & Starflight Concern
Localization.Description: Mass produces very efficient, modular ships, mostly armored freighters of different sizes that make them the preferred brand for traders and larger corporations. Over thirty years ago, MISC signed a lend-lease agreement to establish a tech trade with Xi’An engineers.

English.Name: Musashi Industrial & Starflight Concern
